definition.name: Azure Machine Learning Register Model Action
definition.description: Register a model in your Azure Machine Learning Workspace with this GitHub Action
definition.author: azure/gh-aml

inputs.name: azure_credentials
inputs.description: Paste output of `az ad sp create-for-rbac --name <your-sp-name> --role contributor --scopes /subscriptions/<your-subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/<your-rg> --sdk-auth` as value of secret variable: AZURE_CREDENTIALS

inputs.name: run_id
inputs.description: ID of the run or pipeline run for which a model is to be registered

inputs.name: experiment_name
inputs.description: Experiment name to which the run belongs to

inputs.name: parameters_file
inputs.description: JSON file including the parameters for registering the model.
